entry.name: Added
entry.description: The information is to be or has been added.

entry.name: Deleted
entry.description: The information is to be or has been deleted.

entry.name: Changed
entry.description: The information is to be or has been changed.

entry.name: No action
entry.description: This line item is not affected by the actual message.

entry.name: Accepted without amendment
entry.description: This line item is entirely accepted by the seller.

entry.name: Accepted with amendment
entry.description: This line item is accepted but amended by the seller.

entry.name: Not accepted
entry.description: This line item is not accepted by the seller.

entry.name: Schedule only
entry.description: Code specifying that the message is a schedule only.

entry.name: Amendments
entry.description: Code specifying that amendments are requested/notified.

entry.name: Not found
entry.description: This line item is not found in the referenced message.

entry.name: Not amended
entry.description: This line is not amended by the buyer.

entry.name: Line item numbers changed
entry.description: Code specifying that the line item numbers have changed.

entry.name: Buyer has deducted amount
entry.description: Buyer has deducted amount from payment.

entry.name: Buyer claims against invoice
entry.description: Buyer has a claim against an outstanding invoice.

entry.name: Charge back by seller
entry.description: Factor has been requested to charge back the outstanding item.

entry.name: Seller will issue credit note
entry.description: Seller agrees to issue a credit note.

entry.name: Terms changed for new terms
entry.description: New settlement terms have been agreed.

entry.name: Abide outcome of negotiations
entry.description: Factor agrees to abide by the outcome of negotiations between seller and buyer.

entry.name: Seller rejects dispute
entry.description: Seller does not accept validity of dispute.

entry.name: Settlement
entry.description: The reported situation is settled.

entry.name: No delivery
entry.description: Code indicating that no delivery will be required.

entry.name: Call-off delivery
entry.description: A request for delivery of a particular quantity of goods to be delivered on a particular date (or within a particular period).

entry.name: Proposed amendment
entry.description: A code used to indicate an amendment suggested by the sender.

entry.name: Accepted with amendment, no confirmation required
entry.description: Accepted with changes which require no confirmation.

entry.name: Equipment provisionally repaired
entry.description: The equipment or component has been provisionally repaired.

entry.name: Included
entry.description: Code indicating that the entity is included.

entry.name: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall cover you when due as per your instructions
entry.description: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall cover you when due as per your instructions.

entry.name: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due
entry.description: Upon receipt and verification of documents we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due.

entry.name: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall cover you when due as per your instructions
entry.description: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall cover you when due as per your instructions.

entry.name: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due
entry.description: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall authorize you to debit our account with you when due.

entry.name: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall credit your account with us when due
entry.description: On receipt of your authenticated advice we shall credit your account with us when due.

entry.name: Credit advice requested for direct debit
entry.description: A credit advice is requested for the direct debit.

entry.name: Credit advice and acknowledgement for direct debit
entry.description: A credit advice and acknowledgement are requested for the direct debit.

entry.name: Inquiry
entry.description: Request for information.

entry.name: Checked
entry.description: Checked.

entry.name: Not checked
entry.description: Not checked.

entry.name: Cancelled
entry.description: Discontinued.

entry.name: Replaced
entry.description: Provide a replacement.

entry.name: New
entry.description: Not existing before.

entry.name: Agreed
entry.description: Consent.

entry.name: Proposed
entry.description: Put forward for consideration.

entry.name: Already delivered
entry.description: Delivery has taken place.

entry.name: Additional subordinate structures will follow
entry.description: Additional subordinate structures will follow the current hierarchy level.

entry.name: Additional subordinate structures will not follow
entry.description: No additional subordinate structures will follow the current hierarchy level.

entry.name: Result opposed
entry.description: A notification that the result is opposed.

entry.name: Auction held
entry.description: A notification that an auction was held.

entry.name: Legal action pursued
entry.description: A notification that legal action has been pursued.

entry.name: Meeting held
entry.description: A notification that a meeting was held.

entry.name: Result set aside
entry.description: A notification that the result has been set aside.

entry.name: Result disputed
entry.description: A notification that the result has been disputed.

entry.name: Countersued
entry.description: A notification that a countersuit has been filed.

entry.name: Pending
entry.description: A notification that an action is awaiting settlement.

entry.name: Court action dismissed
entry.description: A notification that a court action will no longer be heard.

entry.name: Referred item, accepted
entry.description: The item being referred to has been accepted.

entry.name: Referred item, rejected
entry.description: The item being referred to has been rejected.

entry.name: Debit advice statement line
entry.description: Notification that the statement line is a debit advice.

entry.name: Credit advice statement line
entry.description: Notification that the statement line is a credit advice.

entry.name: Grouped credit advices
entry.description: Notification that the credit advices are grouped.

entry.name: Grouped debit advices
entry.description: Notification that the debit advices are grouped.

entry.name: Registered
entry.description: The name is registered.

entry.name: Payment denied
entry.description: The payment has been denied.

entry.name: Approved as amended
entry.description: Approved with modifications.

entry.name: Approved as submitted
entry.description: The request has been approved as submitted.

entry.name: Cancelled, no activity
entry.description: Cancelled due to the lack of activity.

entry.name: Under investigation
entry.description: Investigation is being done.

entry.name: Initial claim received
entry.description: Notification that the initial claim was received.

entry.name: Not in process
entry.description: Not in process.

entry.name: Rejected, duplicate
entry.description: Rejected because it is a duplicate.

entry.name: Rejected, resubmit with corrections
entry.description: Rejected but may be resubmitted when corrected.

entry.name: Pending, incomplete
entry.description: Pending because of incomplete information.

entry.name: Under field office investigation
entry.description: Investigation by the field is being done.

entry.name: Pending, awaiting additional material
entry.description: Pending awaiting receipt of additional material.

entry.name: Pending, awaiting review
entry.description: Pending while awaiting review.

entry.name: Reopened
entry.description: Opened again.

entry.name: Processed by primary, forwarded to additional payer(s)
entry.description: This request has been processed by the primary payer and sent to additional payer(s).

entry.name: Processed by secondary, forwarded to additional payer(s)
entry.description: This request has been processed by the secondary payer and sent to additional payer(s).

entry.name: Processed by tertiary, forwarded to additional payer(s)
entry.description: This request has been processed by the tertiary payer and sent to additional payer(s).

entry.name: Previous payment decision reversed
entry.description: A previous payment decision has been reversed.

entry.name: Not our claim, forwarded to another payer(s)
entry.description: A request does not belong to this payer but has been forwarded to another payer(s).

entry.name: Transferred to correct insurance carrier
entry.description: The request has been transferred to the correct insurance carrier for processing.

entry.name: Not paid, predetermination pricing only
entry.description: Payment has not been made and the enclosed response is predetermination pricing only.

entry.name: Documentation claim
entry.description: The claim is for documentation purposes only, no payment required.

entry.name: Reviewed
entry.description: Assessed.

entry.name: Repriced
entry.description: This price was changed.

entry.name: Audited
entry.description: An official examination has occurred.

entry.name: Conditionally paid
entry.description: Payment has been conditionally made.

entry.name: On appeal
entry.description: Reconsideration of the decision has been applied for.

entry.name: Closed
entry.description: Shut.

entry.name: Reaudited
entry.description: A subsequent official examination has occurred.

entry.name: Reissued
entry.description: Issued again.

entry.name: Closed after reopening
entry.description: Reopened and then closed.

entry.name: Redetermined
entry.description: Determined again or differently.

entry.name: Processed as primary
entry.description: Processed as the first.

entry.name: Processed as secondary
entry.description: Processed as the second.

entry.name: Processed as tertiary
entry.description: Processed as the third.

entry.name: Correction of error
entry.description: A correction to information previously communicated which contained an error.

entry.name: Single credit item of a group
entry.description: Notification that the credit item is a single credit item of a group of credit items.

entry.name: Single debit item of a group
entry.description: Notification that the debit item is a single debit item of a group of debit items.

entry.name: Interim response
entry.description: The response is an interim one.

entry.name: Final response
entry.description: The response is an final one.

entry.name: Debit advice requested
entry.description: A debit advice is requested for the transaction.

entry.name: Transaction not impacted
entry.description: Advice that the transaction is not impacted.

entry.name: Patient to be notified
entry.description: The action to take is to notify the patient.

entry.name: Healthcare provider to be notified
entry.description: The action to take is to notify the healthcare provider.

entry.name: Usual general practitioner to be notified
entry.description: The action to take is to notify the usual general practitioner.

entry.name: Advice without details
entry.description: An advice without details is requested or notified.

entry.name: Advice with details
entry.description: An advice with details is requested or notified.

entry.name: Amendment requested
entry.description: An amendment is requested.

entry.name: For information
entry.description: Included for information only.

entry.name: Withdraw
entry.description: A code indicating discontinuance or retraction.

entry.name: Delivery date change
entry.description: The action / notiification is a change of the delivery date.

entry.name: Quantity change
entry.description: The action / notification is a change of quantity.

entry.name: Resale and claim
entry.description: The identified items have been sold by the distributor to the end customer, and compensation for the loss of inventory value is claimed.

entry.name: Resale
entry.description: The identified items have been sold by the distributor to the end customer.

entry.name: Prior addition
entry.description: This existing line item becomes available at an earlier date.

entry.name: Expired
entry.description: This line has expired.

entry.name: Hold
entry.description: This line is on Hold.

entry.name: Open
entry.description: This line is open.

entry.name: Observe
entry.description: The object or item is to be or has been observed.
